evidence.claim: Aircare uses AWS services for scalable infrastructure, ensuring secure data handling compliant with HIPAA standards.
The platform supports FHIR for health data exchange, allowing seamless integration with EHR systems.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on X12 transactions and integration aligns with ICP criteria.
